original: intros. unfold is_ring, is_gcd, divide, is_group, is_opposite, commutativity, intern, associativity, distributivity, neutral, opposite in *. intros [H1 H2 H3 H4 H5]. intros d [Hd1 [Hd2 Hd3]]. destruct H1 as [H6 [H7 [H8 H9]]]. destruct H2 as [H10 [H11 H12]]. destruct H3 as [H13 H14]. destruct H4 as [H15 [H16 H17]]. destruct H5 as [H18 [H19 H20]]. assert (Hd1': A O) by (apply Hd1). assert (Hd2': A O) by (apply Hd2). apply gcd_null in Hd3. destruct Hd3 as [Hd3a Hd3b]. rewrite Hd3a. reflexivity.
